Posts.Content: What is the honey all about?? I didnt no this i have had 1 lot of ec chemo ao far no side effects as yet but would like to be prepared! Xxx

Posts.Content: Simple is a good one. Although paxman the brand of the cool cap have their own range of shampoo o have some have a look online google paxman :) xx
Posts.Title: 26 years old, diagnosed with breast cancer, first chemo tomorrow!

Posts.Content: Just re read everyones comments :) such a lovely bunch of people and its great to hear everyones side of the storey gow they feel there fears etc. It really can just hit anyone at anytime no matter how "healthy" ir "not healthy" someone is! The shock is same for everyone tho!!! Brutal!! Is anyone going to the youngerwomen even in september im sending off my cheque and form today I'm just going to the local one in leeds but there are a few all over and im sure its paid for. If any1 is off to the leeds one let me know :) Have a fab positive day girls â™¥ xxx
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!

Posts.Content: You are very welcome. Its nice for me too to have some one a similar age and circumstances! Where are you from? Yes my chemo is every 3 week next one on 11thSept. Chemo surgery then radiothearpy..thats the plan of action!! Xxx
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!

Posts.Content: I think its a kind of chemo lisa xx
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!

Posts.Content: Its fine lyndsay :) Yes lisa i feel same!! I am from Leeds well live in Leeds i am orginally from NorthernIreland!! I need to have a little look at the facebook group!! Xx
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your reply yes maybe it is lucky but im kind of biding my time for it im sure i will be on here having a moan at some point when im having a bad day!!! Thank god for groups like this!! Xx
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Lisa :) Thanks for the msg. Least we are not alone!!! Luckily my 1st chemo was ok! It was a week today im having EC chemo. I felt a little sick a few hour after a but like morning sickness but i was fine during it and i drove home after it and went out shopping it was when i was out i felt a bit peaky since then i have had no sickness at all! Plus none of my hair has falling out (yet) the cold cap wasnt as bad as i expected it was cold and i got used to it i was convinced it wasnt even on anymore haha my body and hands was cold but they give u tea and a lovely heated blanket!! Its shocking isnt it but we have to go on hun!!! Xxxx
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!

Posts.Content: Hahahaha i will have a look i dont often go on fb im a twitter girl haha but will add it tomorrow!!! Thanks girlies xx
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!

Posts.Content: New to the site! New to it all. Found out i have breast cancer and started my chemo all in the space of a few weeks!! I am having ec chemo and using the cool cap. My first chemo date was 18th Aug. Luckily i have had no sickness and no hair loss!! Although i am aware i have loads of time for this and have found a lovely wig that i will be getting this week!! Although i renamed the wig 'glamhat' as i hate the word wig!! Haha. Im being positive still at work & still smiling. It will be lovely to speak to people going through this too as although i am mostly positive i still have a few tears and feel a bit scared. Got to be strong i have a beautiful 2year old baby girl who needs a "normal"life :) feel free to add me and talk. Lots of love Steph xxx
Posts.Title: 28years old with breast cancer!!!
